name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A game in which two players seek in alternate turns to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O's or three X's drawn in the spaces of a grid of nine squares.

name: Space Shooter
description: Space Shooter is an arcade game where you control a spaceship in space with a 2D view, your objective is to survive the flyings saucers and asteroids to complete the different levels, you will see that the levels will quickly become more complex.
